author: Mitch Alves
comment: Amazon is really becoming a poor shopping store: (1) Immense amount of low grade Chinese products. (2) plethora of FAKE reviews. (3) Horrible Filter to find the correct item. Walmart and eBay are so much better! (4) Prime is becoming unworthy as other store prices are just the same without the membership!

author: Zig Mandel
comment: really sucks at creating a new shipping address. switching to another app to copy then paste in the address fields will completely erase everything you typed so far in the entire page so its impossible to paste the address bits into each field. very annoying and surprised the team didn't look into this.

author: Deanna Roundy
comment: Of course this app is extremely useful. The reason for my three star review is the app is not always functional. When I try to click "add to list" or "add to cart" it doesn't always work right away or at all. I end up mashing my finger against the screen only for nothing to happen. I have to close out of the app and reload it sometimes just to click "add to cart' and it be successful.

author: Jeff Nelson
comment: Love convience of Amazon but customer service and policies suck.  I got nasty email saying I cannot give reviews on products cause I am related to sellers.  Of which none of it is true.  But they said all decisions are final.    In short they must not have liked my review on one of their products.  Oh well I guess I can save a few minutes per purchase by not providing my feedback anymore

author: Tony Pietersma
comment: I don't like how Prime is very easy to accidentally sign up to but a right pain to get out of. Seems like Amazon are being kinda tricky. A good company would act more professionally.

Amazon is great as a service, but the app itself has been giving me issues for awhile. Namely, the "Add to Cart" button never works (it takes 1000 clicks) yet the "Buy it Now" button works instantaneously... extremely annoying when trying to shop.

author: Kelly S
comment: Galaxy S8. Fine since January, last two weeks its freezing and logging out constantly. Have to use web browser to shop Amazon. Extremely uncool for mega Corp, espesh as a new Prime member. Cannot uninstall cuz comes on phone. Have updated several times.

author: steve muscroft
comment: VIRTUAL DASH BUTTONS! awful idea, let me permanently disable them. Already have had to cancel orders due to accidentally touching them while scrolling in app.

author: Connor Payne \the Frozen Doctor/
comment: I like the idea of the new AR thing, I just wish it was on the MOTO Z Force DROID. I know it's possible, so please add it

author: Vali Beramoose
comment: The only shortcoming I see in using this app vs ordering on computer is the lack of the Smile option and can't use the orders to impact the donations. For larger orders I still prefer the desktop version, but smaller stuff it's fast and easy to order.

You shouldn't offer next day delivery if you can't follow through with it! Next time I'll buy locally for $40 more but at least I'll have my part and not lose out on $2000 of income due to your incompetence! Ordered on time Friday, paid for Saturday delivery, and now I won't get it until Tuesday! Oh well, I'm sure Amazon could care less. I did get a refund on shipping and a $40 shopping credit so...... There's that I suppose!

author: Maria Mills
comment: I used to give this 4 stars but now it's getting one because the suff I ordered never comes on time or they say they have delivered it when I've not got it and sometimes you can't get hold of the seller and if u do you may get a very rude message back. I will be thinking about taking my custom elsewhere if this don't get sorted. Yes I understand thing u ordered come from China or where ever but to be fare it can get here the next day as I ordered something and it didn't come and I contacted the seller and they sent it again and I got it the very next day interesting really isn't.

author: Jason Clift
comment: It's Amazon but the app has some issues. Very slow browsing around the site and internal app menus and add to list requires about 50 pushes to bring up the dialogue to select a list and on 50 percent of the time does it actually load the lists to select which one

author: Janelle Martin
comment: I'm petty disappointed by Prime shipping.  It used to be true that all orders eligible for Prime shipping would mean 2- day delivery, but recently, more and more orders (even those fulfilled and shipped by Amazon) are taking 4 or 5 days for delivery.  Also,  about half of our orders are not even getting delivered to our house,  but instead getting dropped off at the post office,  which has very limited hours (lunchtime only,  when we're at work), so we're having to wait until the weekend before we can even go get our packages. Please,  please stop this,  Amazon! Its completely removing the benefit of online shopping- I'd rather go out and buy a product in store,  and have it right away,  rather than wait a week and a half before reveiving anything,  and then Still having to go drive to pick it up!   Come on, Amazon Prime,  this isn't what you're advertising.

STOP SHOVING PRIME DOWN MY THROAT! Every time I open the app it wants me to sign up. Every time I place an order it defaults to 2 day shipping and asks me to sign up. What part of I'm not interested do you not understand? Walmart offers free two day shipping and their products often cost less. The content is poorly organized with weird mapping between products and categories makes it hard to find things. User reviews and products are often mismatched. Search and filtering work in mysterious ways. The app has gotten ridiculously slow. Customer service has been getting worse and worse.

author: Gary Shaw
comment: App worked great until I got a Huawei P10 now it doesn't work right I cannot load any pages please fix this as soon as possible as I do most of my shopping through Amazon

author: Graham
comment: App is useless after update cant select size, still useless after 2 more updates, why cant we use the old version that worked properly?, come on amazon get ur act together!!!  Glad to see uv'e went back to the old version for size\colours, so back up to 5 stars

author: MrOrangeGoop Jr.
comment: Ever since the update before the last one, I have not been able to use the app on my Wi-Fi. I can use it on my phone data but as soon as I switch to Wi-Fi it immediately stops working. I don't know why my Wi-Fi would be a problem considering I can use everything in my house that needs Wi-Fi to work.

author: Dragomir Andrei
comment: I love the app and I find the new update very helpful, even though the AR view option isn't showing up in the menu. I have a Samsung galaxy s7 so the option should be available

author: Amjad Abdeen
comment: On my phone S8+ when I click on an object to see or to purchase an item it enlarges for no reason and the whole app is slow I can't scroll fast . It happens only if I click and view an object . Please sort it out it's really Annoying a lot .

author: LAWRENCE PHAN
comment: I HAVE NO ISSUES WITH THE APP. MOST OF MY U.K. ORDERS TO MALAYSIA ARRIVED WITHIN TEN DAYS OF PURCHASE. U.S. ORDERS TO MALAYSIA MAY TAKE 22 DAYS BY STANDARD SHIPPING BUT THIS IS UNDERSTANDABLE GIVEN UNITED STATES IS LOCATED ON THE OTHER FAR SIDE OF THE GLOBE. HOWEVER,  IF YOU OPT FOR U.S. AMAZON GLOBAL SHIPPING, THE PARCEL MAY TAKE 7 TO 8 DAYS TO ARRIVE IN MALAYSIA.  ORDERS FROM AMAZON JAPAN, NOW CONDUCTED IN ENGLISH, IS MY TOP FAVOURITE NOW, WITH THE SHIPMENT ARRIVING WITHIN 3 TO 5 DAYS USING JAPAN AMAZON GLOBAL SHIPPING.  ANOTHER FEATURE IN THE APP IS THAT, IF THE CUSTOMER WOULD ONLY USE THE "CONTACT US " MENU IN THE APP TO HIS ADVANTAGE AND DIRECT THE CONSUMER SERVICE OFFICER TO THE PROBLEM CONCERNED, HE WILL PROMPTLY HANDLE THE CLAIMS EFFECTIVELY. MOST COMPLAINTS AND FEEDBACK ARE ANSWERED WITHIN THE 24 HOUR TIME FRAME.

author: cynthie morgenthaler
comment: I get notifications about things I might be interested in, but if I click on it, sometimes I just go to Amazon's main page and the message disappears. Then I may not remember enough about the product to search for it. Drives me nuts!

author: nick ventura
comment: Dont like the notification its not working right so i order a package today and when its delivered it doesn't tell me on my phone screen like no ring nothing, i have to open the app and look at my orders and it will show sayin delivered like why does that happen? I should be getting a ring saying your package is delivered, it freakin showed like 20mins after my package was ready delivered and i made sure i have the app notifications on and everything and it still dont show until later on and im just worried cause i needa know when my package is there cause people love stealin packages in my hood so please take care of that notification problem i have a galaxy S7

author: Johnathan Dickinson
comment: All of a sudden it's started popping up random notifications on items I may like.  I never allowed for the app to do this, and I find it very intrusive. Seconds of my life have been wasted swiping away notifications for items I will never be interested in (because I've used Amazon to buy the actual item I wanted in the first place, so I don't care for similar items).  I asked an Amazon rep to fix it and he said I had to reinstall the app. Absolutely clueless, at least I don't have this issue with eBay.

author: Kaitlyn Quigg
comment: Everything was fine until the last update. Now it crashes as soon as it opens. I've uninstalled and reinstalled it. Same issue.
The app keep opening itself completely randomly. Start to get really annoying. Other than that, it's great.

author: Joey McNew
comment: Stop sending me several of your spam emails of your ideas. I order what I want, not what you think I should order.

author: Walter Talledo
comment: App freezes randomly and it's frustrating. I can't add nothing to my shopping cart or wishlist.

author: Patrick Troy
comment: Overall good app but often has technical problems which make it unusable

author: OG WHiTEBOY
comment: How Am I Able 2 get my code if I cant sign n fix this asap!

author: Jeremy Zimmerman
comment: I really love Amazon in most cases but you guys can seriously do some stupid stuff sometimes. In the latest update description you talk about something called a Pixel + and a Pixel 2 +. There's no such device.
To much costly things I don't like this app
Since last update won't display photos when clicking on them.  Galaxy note 8

author: Joshua Doll
comment: Add to cart button doesn't work. Right when you're about to click continue shopping a stupid ad pops up right in the place of the continue shopping. You click on it every time. Stupid

author: Kristen Maksuta
comment: There is no "sign out" button. I even searched the internet for the answer to what should be extremely simple, and Amazon's help section (outdated), all the instructions provided did not lead me to an option that allowed me to sign out. I even tried editing my email and password, where it stated that that login information was already in use (duh). Seriously, it's not hard to provide such a simple feature, and this app does not contain the most basic of features. So, yeah, 1 star until this gets changed, and I'll be looking elsewhere for future purchases if this is the behavior i can expect from Amazon. For shame.

author: Jamie m
comment: Keeps freezing on galaxy S8+ check out button freezes and images dont load, i have to keep restarting app to make an order.

I love shopping thru the Amazon app I get great products at a great price but I also get my order with in days of ordering so it's well worth my time to shop this way versus driving for hours in traffic. Thank You Amazon.

author: brad martin
comment: Man you pay for prime shipping for 2 days shipping and they send it usps which gets delayed due to snow? What happened to they run rain sleet or snow how about the guarenteed delivery date? You gonna refund my prime membership? U could have send them ups or something to get them here on time. Delivery date was suppose to be for saturday i saw it was delayed but said it would be delivered today sunday...now your saying not until monday so my 2 day shipping is now 4 why am i paying for 2 day shipping then aweful company.

author: Matt Landry
comment: Everything i ever ordered ive gotten. I only trust amazon because i got ripped off 1800 dollars from a fake ebay page.

author: Tuna 156
comment: I cant say that its a bad app or that it's Amazon's falt but it's like evry time somthing gos wrong i get 2 day shiping and 5 days later i still dont have my purchase or like the one time it said it was delivered and never at the dore and considering i was home the whole day know for a fact was not stolen its upsetting to me that this is a frequent thing dont get me wrong some times it comes on time with no problem but wen it doesn't its a big pain in your ass wen you could have just walked in the store and might I mention you dont get a refund for the 2 day shipping if it dose not come in 2 days👿!
